name: Wild Frontier
description:
Escape to an enchanting, living sandbox surrounded by wildlife and nature. Scavenge materials and craft tools to build your own house.
Survive by hunting cooking and growing your own food. Be careful though, the forest is as dangerous as it is wonderful.

- Explore a vast island

- Hunt animals for food

- Explore POI's

- Use guns and traps

- Gather natural resources such as special minerals and wood to build survival tools and structures

- Build a base and tools to survive
